SELECT dt.id_field, dp.id, dp.id AS value, IF(dp.standard_name IS NULL OR dp.standard_name = '', dp.name, dp.standard_name) AS label FROM device_template_field_map dt LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp ON dp.id = dt.id_param WHERE dt.id_template = #{id_template} AND dt.id_device_group = #{id_device_group} AND dt.id_categorize_data = #{id_categorize_data} AND dt.id_param IS NOT NULL AND dp.status = 1 AND dp.is_delete = 0

SELECT dt.id_device_group, dt.id_categorize_data, dl.data, JSON_ARRAYAGG(JSON_OBJECT( 'id_field', dt.id_field, 'id', dp.id, 'label', IF(dp.standard_name IS NULL OR dp.standard_name = '', dp.name, dp.standard_name) )) AS assignedField FROM device_template_field_map dt LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp ON dp.id = dt.id_param LEFT JOIN device_layout_template dl ON dl.id = dt.id_template WHERE dt.id_device_group = #{id_device_group} AND dp.status = 1 AND dp.is_delete = 0 AND dp.is_user_defined = 0 AND dl.status = 1 AND dl.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY dt.id_device_group, dt.id_categorize_data
